computed.playerLoginDetails:
const stringUserId = String(userId.value)
return {
  userName: `Test_${props.index}`,
  loginType: '1',
  deviceId: `test${props.index}`,
  type: '2',
  userId: userId.value,
  roomId: roomId.value,
  isUserTurn: String(turnUserId.value) === stringUserId && turnUserId.value !== null,
  isDealer: dealerUserId.value === stringUserId,
  isSmallBlind: smallBlindUserId.value === stringUserId,
  isBigBlind: bigBlindUserId.value === stringUserId,
  isCheck: playerCurrentDecision.value.includes(Constants.Action.Check),
  isCall: playerCurrentDecision.value.includes(Constants.Action.Call),
  isRaise: playerCurrentDecision.value.includes(Constants.Action.Raise),
  isFold: playerCurrentDecision.value.includes(Constants.Action.Fold),
  isAllIn: playerCurrentDecision.value.includes(Constants.Action.AllIn),
  isSetHand: playerCurrentDecision.value.includes(Constants.Action.SetHand),
  isDiscard: playerCurrentDecision.value.includes(Constants.Action.Discard),
}

1-left.text: Player: {{ playerLoginDetails.userName }} / User ID: {{ playerLoginDetails.userId }} / Room ID: {{ playerLoginDetails.roomId }} ({{ status }})
